About

As a consultant Human Factors & Web Technologies and CTO at Informaat, Cornelis is on an ongoing mission to help businesses to design products their clients really like to use. With his knowledge about fields as diverse as interior design, visual design, interaction design and front end programming, he supports multi disciplinary teams to reach their goals and to reach those fast.
